  2. subsystem=ejb3
  3. cache

Management API Reference for cache

A SFSB cache

Deprecated Since 10.0.0
Deprecated. Use simple-cache or distributable-cache instead.

Attributes (2)

  • aliases - The aliases by which this cache may also be referenced
    Type LIST
    Is the attribute nillable? true
    Where is the attribute stored? configuration
    Access Type read-write
    Is restarted required? no-services
    Stability Level default
    Raw DMR model 
    
{
    "type" : {
        "TYPE_MODEL_VALUE" : "LIST"
    },
    "description" : "The aliases by which this cache may also be referenced",
    "expressions-allowed" : false,
    "required" : false,
    "nillable" : true,
    "min-length" : 0,
    "max-length" : 2147483647,
    "stability" : "default",
    "value-type" : {
        "TYPE_MODEL_VALUE" : "STRING"
    },
    "access-type" : "read-write",
    "storage" : "configuration",
    "restart-required" : "no-services",
    "capability-reference" : null
}
  • passivation-store - The passivation store used by this cache
    Type STRING
    Is the attribute nillable? true
    Does the attribute allow expression? true
    Where is the attribute stored? configuration
    Access Type read-write
    Is restarted required? no-services
    Stability Level default
    Raw DMR model 
    
{
    "type" : {
        "TYPE_MODEL_VALUE" : "STRING"
    },
    "description" : "The passivation store used by this cache",
    "expressions-allowed" : true,
    "required" : false,
    "nillable" : true,
    "min-length" : 1,
    "max-length" : 2147483647,
    "stability" : "default",
    "access-type" : "read-write",
    "storage" : "configuration",
    "restart-required" : "no-services",
    "capability-reference" : null
}

Operations (2)

  • add - Adds a cache
    Request Parameter Type Required Expressions Allowed Default value Description
    aliases LIST false false The aliases by which this cache may also be referenced
    passivation-store STRING false true The passivation store used by this cache
    Raw DMR model 
    
{
    "operation-name" : "add",
    "description" : "Adds a cache",
    "request-properties" : {
        "aliases" : {
            "type" : {
                "TYPE_MODEL_VALUE" : "LIST"
            },
            "description" : "The aliases by which this cache may also be referenced",
            "expressions-allowed" : false,
            "required" : false,
            "nillable" : true,
            "min-length" : 0,
            "max-length" : 2147483647,
            "stability" : "default",
            "value-type" : {
                "TYPE_MODEL_VALUE" : "STRING"
            }
        },
        "passivation-store" : {
            "type" : {
                "TYPE_MODEL_VALUE" : "STRING"
            },
            "description" : "The passivation store used by this cache",
            "expressions-allowed" : true,
            "required" : false,
            "nillable" : true,
            "min-length" : 1,
            "max-length" : 2147483647,
            "stability" : "default"
        }
    },
    "reply-properties" : {},
    "stability" : "default",
    "read-only" : false,
    "runtime-only" : false
}
  • remove - Removes a cache
    Raw DMR model 
    
{
    "operation-name" : "remove",
    "description" : "Removes a cache",
    "request-properties" : {},
    "reply-properties" : {},
    "stability" : "default",
    "read-only" : false,
    "restart-required" : "resource-services",
    "runtime-only" : false
}

Galleon Features

Galleon features are to be used when creating Galleon feature-packs.

  • subsystem.ejb3.cache 
            
<feature spec="subsystem.ejb3.cache">
  <param name="cache" value="{resource name}"/>
  <param name="aliases" value="{value}"/>
  <param name="passivation-store" value="{value}"/>
<feature/>
